Name: Fantasy Defense
About the game: Evil woke up! Horde of an evil wizard, which is ready to seize all kingdom of Hamdar. Ahead of you is a difficult task - build a powerful defensive system and throw an evil army into Hell. 12 levels and more than 6 hours of gameplay. Improve towers and strength. The forces of light will win! Survive Mode: • In survival mode you will encounter countless troops of an evil wizard. Features: • Improve the tower and magic in the store. • heroes will help you to hold back the forces of evil. • collect crystals. • In any location you can find hidden gold.
